A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Was very excited to see this movie.  After seeing it\, I have lost any interest in seeing the future Disney Star Wars films.  I was excited to learn more about the cliffhangers setup in Episode VII.  I was excited to see Luke training Rey.  I was excited about Snoke's backstory and learning more about that.  Rian Johnson said screw all that.  Outright dropping those threads.  Luke Skywalker was also terribly mishandled as a character.  Honestly\, I enjoyed the Phantom Menace more than this film.
